entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kangiqsualujjuaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:16 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -33.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kangiqsualujjuaq Airport 03:36 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -33.2°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -44
Dewpoint: -38.0°C
Wind: WNW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Local blowing snow. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 51 in the morning and minus 42 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 30.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 30. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
